text: @TheDailyShow @RyanfromNy If it wasn’t so damn serious I could actually laugh at his stupidity-but his complete intolerance for anyone but himself , his outright cruelty to others and his daily onslaught of lies is chilling #TrumpLiesPeopleDie #VoteBlueToSaveAmerica #Coronavirus

entity.name: The Daily Show with Trevor Noah
entity.description: Hosted by Trevor Noah since 2015, "The Daily Show" is an Emmy- and Peabody Award-winning program that examines the day's biggest news stories in politics, pop culture, entertainment, sports and more. Trevor's team of correspondents -- Ronny Chieng, Michael Kosta, Desi Lydic, Dulcé Sloan, Jaboukie Young-White and Roy Wood Jr. -- along with contributors Lewis Black and Jordan Klepper provide coverage of (and catharsis from) daily events through a sharp, reality-based lens. Trevor also sits down with the people making news to get their unfiltered takes on U.S. culture, foreign affairs and more.
